TEXT.S:
adupu kamu nu adup adup , u kamu nu Amilika: hunting
aadupen miadup miadupay piadupan
u zumazuma nu tinaku a kamu adup adup sa ku selal sa u makudusay a sizi. makudusay: u uzip nu tademaw atu aadupen, caykayadah ku titi, azihan tanuukak saan.
aadupen i buyubuyu'an ku aadupen a mauzip. i bayubayuan ku buting a mauzip.
miadup miadup kita u kapah ayza. lalimiadup ku kapah, tayza bayu' miadup atu mideteng.
miadupay u miadupay ku acawa nu maku. u miadupay ku wawa nu maku, matineng miadup ku wawa atu acawa nu maku.
piadupan u piadupan aku sa i nuzikuzan nina buyu'. nu makuay a piadupan itiza i nuzikuzan nina buyu'.
